com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth

Class SalesforceTLSSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.SocketFactory
      • javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
        • com.salesforce.androidsdk.auth.SalesforceTLSSocketFactory

  • public class SalesforceTLSSocketFactory
extends javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
    Custom SSLSocketFactory implementation to disable the default usage of TLS 1.0, and use only TLS 1.1 or 1.2, as per Salesforce server's new requirements. This implementation is only required for Android 4.4 (KitKat), since TLS 1.1 or 1.2 are the default in Android Lollipop (5.0) and above. FIXME: Remove this class once minApi >= Lollipop.
    Author:
    bhariharan
